sect2.title: Installation de STLport
sect2.para: Installez STLport en lançant les commandes suivantes:

screen.userinput: patch -Np1 -i ../STLport-&STLport-version;-gcc3.patch && CXX_INCLUDE=`( g++ -v -E -xc++ /dev/null 2>&1 > /dev/null ) \ | sed -n 's~ \(/usr/include/c++/.*\)/backward~\1~p'` && cp stlport/config/stl_gcc.h stlport/config/stl_gcc.h.orig && sed "s~\.\./g++-v3~$CXX_INCLUDE~;s~\.\./include/g++-v3~$CXX_INCLUDE~" \ stlport/config/stl_gcc.h.orig > stlport/config/stl_gcc.h && make && make INSTALLDIR=/usr install
